### Government Tender Announcement

#### General Maintenance, Newcastle, Bathurst and Campbellton Armouries, New Brunswick

* **Reference Number:** WS3895230993
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3895230993
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** February 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Three years from the date of contract award, with possible extensions

#### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity:** New Brunswick
* **Region of Delivery:** New Brunswick

#### Background Information

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of various services related to general maintenance at the Newcastle, Bathurst, and Campbellton Armouries in New Brunswick. The services include, but are not limited to, civil, structural, mechanical, and electrical work. The contract will be for a period of three years from the date of contract award, with possible extensions as required. The contract is an agreement and not a formal contract, and there is no guarantee that the full or any amount of the RISO will be called-up.

#### Contract Details

The contract will require the successful bidder to provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, and equipment to complete the required work. The contract will be governed by the terms and conditions outlined in the bid document, including the Specification Number L-M186-9900/109. The contract will be monitored and managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence.

#### Contact Information

For more information on this tender opportunity, please contact:

Edward Johnston, SPAC/PSPC
edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please note that the tender closing date is March 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time), and all bids must be submitted electronically through the Bid Solicitation Public Works and Government Services Canada website.
